title: No child node listing when changing data source for a dataset in data set editor page of the query tab
OB: When changing the data source for a dataset in the data set editor page of the query tab, there is no child node listing.
EB: When changing the data source for a dataset in the data set editor page of the query tab, the child node listing should be displayed correctly.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new dataset without any SQL statement. 2. Ensure that the new data source has no database/table/column information. 3. Attempt to change the data source for the dataset. Verify that no child node listing is displayed. 4. Close the data set editor and reopen it to see if the issue persists.
